line: Hello… you said you’re calling about the office? Which office, exactly?

choices.text: Wait… I think I imagined it.

line: 'Yes,' the voice says, firm. 'You were there. Everything—Greg, the stapler, Cheryl… it all happened. Or will happen.'
You recount the breakroom, the shrine, the meditation circle… and the caller seems pleased. 'Good. Reality needs witnesses.'
The caller laughs softly. 'Denying is part of it. But you know. Deep down, you know.'
'You’re not sure? Excellent. That uncertainty is what drives the project.' A faint hum vibrates through the line.

choices.text: Ask to enter the office again.

line: The voice whispers: 'Project Reverie is everywhere and nowhere. The office is only the beginning.' Click. Silence.

choices.text: Try calling back to learn more.
